name: Rise of The Rebel Tyrant
description:
Burrich was the rebel leader of the southlands until his life was taken in a great battle against the oppressive northmen. Though his body crumpled his soul refused to leave the world and lingered in his sword. Many years later the next rebel hero Kenrith would find Burrich and using his blade harvest his justice. 

This is a story about how power corrupts and how violence breeds more violence. 

Content warning - war, murder and oppression.

Controls 

Z will advance the text. 

X will load it quickly.

M will mute all sounds/music, this can be toggled on or off. 

Click the fullscreen button to go fullscreen and the ESC button on the keyboard to exit fullscreen.
